reviewText: After a couple of weeks of following just the basic stretches on this 3-level training, I've managed to eliminate lumbar pain and improve my pop-up for surfing. At age 57, I've shrunk in height a bit, and this feels like it's helping to re-create some of the distance between vertebrae. My posture has improved, and I've responded flexibly to some astounding wave close-outs, preventing injury through daily pole stretching.
